titles.title: To amend section 932 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to create a biofuel and fuel cell vehicle research, development, and demonstration program, and for other purposes.
Biofuel Cell Research Act
Biofuel Cell Research Act

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.
Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Biofuel Cell Research Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy (DOE) to establish a research, development, and demonstration program to expand the use of biofuels in vehicles. Under the program, DOE must develop a commercially viable fuel cell system that uses biofuel as a fuel source.
